Tata Electronics is hiring for multiple positions in Facility Management ( large-scale Utility Operations and Maintenance function) at Hosur. Positions - Deputy Manager, Assistant Manager, Senior Engineer, and Engineer with hands-on experience in Electrical or Mechanical domains. Candidates should have strong expertise in operating and maintaining major utility systems such as HT & LT Electrical Distribution Systems, DRUPS, DG Sets, UPS, Chillers, Compressors, Cooling Towers, and other related infrastructure. Qualifications: - Deputy Manager / Assistant Manager BE / B.Tech in Mechanical or Electrical Engineering 10‚Äì12 years of relevant experience - Senior Engineer / Engineer Diploma or BE in Mechanical or Electrical Engineering 5‚Äì7 years of relevant experience please share resume at veerachinnammal.s@tataelectronics.co.in.

üöÄ We‚Äôre Hiring: SAP S/4HANA CO Consultant (Mozart) üìç Location: Bengaluru üïí Experience: 6‚Äì8 Years We are looking for an experienced SAP S/4HANA CO Consultant to join our growing team. If you are passionate about financial controlling, SAP transformations, and working on high-impact global projects, this role is for you! ____________ üîç Role Highlights As a Senior Consultant, you will play a key role in driving SAP Controlling solutions, leading implementations, and supporting business transformation initiatives across regions. ____________ üéØ Key Requirements ‚úî Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Finance, Accounting, or related field (MBA / certifications preferred) ‚úî 6+ years of hands-on experience in SAP Controlling (CO) ‚úî Proven experience in SAP implementations / upgrades ‚úî Strong understanding of financial accounting principles ‚úî Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills ‚úî Ability to manage multiple projects in a fast-paced environment ____________ üõ† Technical Expertise ‚Ä¢ SAP FI/CO & S/4HANA Certified ‚Ä¢ Strong exposure to S/4HANA and Central Finance (CFIN) ‚Ä¢ In-depth knowledge of: o Cost Object Controlling o Internal Orders (IO) o Profit Center Accounting (PCA) o Product Costing o Material Ledger (ML) o Profitability Analysis (COPA) o Cost Allocations & New GL ‚Ä¢ Strong FI integration with SD, MM ‚Ä¢ Experience in interface design & end-to-end process flows ‚Ä¢ Familiarity with S/4HANA Accounting practices ____________ üåç Work Flexibility ‚Ä¢ Willingness to support UK, US, and APAC time zones ‚Ä¢ Flexible to provide support during weekends and holidays when required Interested candidates can share the cv to operations@shashwathsolution.com

üöÄ We‚Äôre Hiring: IBM ETL DataStage Consultant üìç Location: Bengaluru üïí Experience: 6‚Äì10 Years üõ† Mandatory Skills: ETL DataStage | Shell Scripting / Python | SQL DB We are looking for a highly skilled IBM ETL DataStage Consultant to join our data engineering team.
